events.name: Ace Presentation by TST Florida
events.description: A collaborative project from several ace members of the Florida congregation compiled for Lupercalia.

events.name: Sex Work and Cupcakes: Conversations about identity with Ada King, Mischief Madness & Chalice Blythe
events.description: Join Chalice Blythe, Mischief Madness and Ada King for unwrapping presents from @divinetoys, cupcakes and conversations about not being straight while doing sex work.

events.name: Be Gay Do Witchcraft: LGBTQIA Witches Throughout the Ages with Salem Witch Wiles
events.description: Join Thomas O'Brien Vallor for a journey through a telling of bitchin' gay witches throughout history.

events.name: Gender Affirmation Ritual with Priest Joe Dee
events.description: Pre-recorded video of Priest Joe Dee performing a gender affirmation ritual with members of TSTNYC. Eritque arcus, translating to rainbow in Latin, is a celebratory ritual of gender affirmation & the dismantling of social norms so all can live with Pride.

events.name: Queer Magick with Shiva Honey & Grahamzig
events.description: Dj set with Shiva Honey and Grahamzig highlighting LGBTQ+ artists and dedicating the set to queer power + liberation.

events.name: Satanic Panic Archive Library
events.description: Browse the archives, courtesy of Grey Faction.
